Srinivasa Rao, residing at 'Sri Venkatesha Krupa', No.276, 10th Cross, Banashankari I Stage, IInd Block, Bangalore-50, Karnataka State, do hereby solemly affirm and declare on oath as follows:- I have given birth to a male child on the second day of January, one thousand nine hundred and thirty- seven (2-1-1937) at Sri Wallikarjunaiah's house, Karnic Road, Shankarapura, Bangalore, Karnataka State. The said child was subsequently named as 'G.S.Ranachandra Rao' I am making this declaration since a record of the birth of the said child was not registered with the concerned authorities at Bangalore Municipal Office. I declare that this is my name and signature and the facts stated above are true and correct to the best of my knowledge, belief and information.
